title: On The Gathering Storm
description: Hannah Garretty is snatched from her bohemian life on the island and vanishes into a forest lair where unspeakable things have happened and will continue to happen. We catch visceral glimpses from before the abduction, when she last came face to face with her own mortality. But can Hannah find a scrap of light in the absolute darkness of her ordeal?
author: Jason McIntyre
